Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near State/63rd
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses rerouted Westbound via 63rd, Prairie, 59th, Yale & 63rd: Eastbound via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, Prairie & 63rd due to street blockage nr State/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near State/63rd.

  • Westbound via 63rd, Prairie, 59th, Yale and 63rd.
  • Eastbound via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, Prairie and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.
